output_list.code: function transferOwnership(address newOwner) onlyOwner public { owner = newOwner; }
output_list.reason: The transferOwnership function allows anyone to change the owner of the contract. This can lead to unauthorized access and loss of funds if the new owner is malicious.

output_list.code: function setPrices(uint256 newSellPrice, uint256 newBuyPrice) onlyOwner public { sellPrice = newSellPrice; buyPrice = newBuyPrice; }
output_list.reason: The setPrices function allows anyone to change the buy and sell prices of the token. This can lead to unauthorized access and loss of funds if the new prices are set maliciously.

output_list.code: function setExchange(bool istrue) onlyOwner public { isOpened = istrue; }
output_list.reason: The setExchange function allows anyone to open or close the exchange. This can lead to unauthorized access and loss of funds if the exchange is set maliciously.
